data.title: Live Listen free online
data.meta_description: Listen to Legends 102.7 online. Access the free transmission of the Legends 102.7 radio station and discover many more radio stations
data.text:
What is a PWA app?

A progressive web application, known by its acronym in English as PWA (Progressive Web App), is an application that plays directly in a browser instead of being installed on a device's operating system.

How to install a PWA on Android?

To install a Progressive Web Application (PWA) or Web/APP, application stores are not necessary, so you do not need to go to the Play Store or App Store. Just visit them with your browser and look for the option "Install Application" or "Add to home screen"

How to install a PWA on iOS?

Access the PWA through its URL from Safari. Click on the share button in Safari. Click on "Add to home screen" Check that the name that appears on the home screen suits you. Modify it if necessary and click on "Add"
